title: Scarlett Johansson is picture perfect in feathers and monochrome at Paris premiere following divorce drama
text:
Showbiz Scarlett Johansson is picture perfect in feathers and monochrome at Paris premiere following divorce drama The Hollywood actress appeared to be in good spirits as she posed for pictures at the Grand Rex theatre Share Scarlett Johansson oozes glam in this outfit (Photo: Getty) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Scarlett Johansson made her mark on the blue carpet at the Paris premiere of Ghost in the Shell on Tuesday night. 
Despite a rocky few months that saw her file for divorce from her husband Romain Dauriac, the Hollywood actress appeared to be in good spirits as she posed for pictures at the Grand Rex theatre in the French capital. 
Scarlett was oozing glamour in two sexy Azzedine Alaia designs. 
Adding even more fierceness to her look, she opted to wear a feathered black skirt over the designer's black and white mini dress.   Europe)   Europe) 
She finished off the outfit with a pair of silver studded boots. 
Her appearance comes after her husband Romain said he was "shocked" to learn his wife had officially filed for divorce earlier this month. 
Romain's lawyer Harold Mayerson told People magazine: "We were shocked that they filed these proceedings in court. We had been negotiating information relevant to their child Rose and also economic issues, so we were stunned when they did this. We've told [Johansson and her lawyers] that we would go to any means to try to avoid this." Scarlett and Romain in happier times  ) (Photo: PA)   North America) Scarlett Johansson (Photo: Rex Features) 
Scarlett had earlier released a statement asking for people to "respect" her decision and stop commenting on her marital status. 
In the statement, she said: "As a devoted mother and private person and with complete awareness that my daughter will one day be old enough to read the news about herself, I would only like to say that I will never, ever be commenting on the dissolution of my marriage. 
"Out of respect for my desires as a parent and out of respect for all working moms, it is with kindness that I ask other parties involved and the media to do the same. Thank you." Like us on Facebook
